meanings.definition: A member of the Malemiut tribe.
meanings.sent1: The malemiut gathered around the fire to share stories.
meanings.sent2: I met a malemiut who told me about their traditions.
meanings.sent3: The malemiut decided to have a dance-off to settle a disagreement.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the malemiut, unity was their strength.
meanings.sent5: The malemiut's colorful attire brightened up the village.

meanings.definition: The language spoken by the Malemiut people.
meanings.sent1: Learning the malemiut was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The elders passed down the malemiut to the younger generation.
meanings.sent3: During the festival, everyone tried speaking the malemiut with funny accents.
meanings.sent4: Her words in malemiut painted a beautiful picture of their culture.
meanings.sent5: The malemiut flowed like music, soothing to the ears.
